thread.title: BRIEF-Wing Tai Properties To ‍Dispose Allied Effort Ltd For‍ HK$2.85 Bln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Wing Tai Properties To ‍Dispose Allied Effort Ltd For‍ HK$2.85 Bln

organizations.name: brief-wing tai properties to ‍dispose allied effort ltd

text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Wing Tai Properties Ltd:
* ANNOUCES ‍DISPOSAL OF 100 PCT INTEREST IN ALLIED EFFORT LIMITED FOR‍ HK$2.85 BILLION
* ‍GROUP EXPECTS TO RECOGNISE A GAIN ON DISPOSAL IN AMOUNT OF APPROXIMATELY HK$1,060 MILLION
* ALLIED EFFORT TO BE SOLD TO ‍TOP SINCERITY LTD * ‍APPLICATION HAS BEEN MADE FOR RESUMPTION OF TRADING IN SHARES OF CO WITH EFFECT FROM 9:00 A.M. ON FEB 2, 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
